2. Adds the search interface.
3. Adds the function to mirror Android to iPhone.

These features make mirroring much easier.

1.Adds the function to connect phone to PC/TV via PIN code
2.Fixes the problem that the screen is black when mirroring between iOS devices
3.Fixes the problem that the screen cannot be fully displayed when mirroring PC to iPad
4.Other fixes and improvements

1. Adds new features to control PPT on PC from your phone.
2. Adds new drawing orientation option.
3. Adds option: Phone control mode. You can control PC from phone by using cursor or touch.
4. Other fixes and improvements

1. Now app can find PC software in the detecting list
